content: The game play is amazing! Well worth the $2. Been playing for a week now and I love the classic style of turn based rpgs. Skill trees are awesome and the static skill system is great. There is many possibilities to make your character its easy to reset all stats if you don't like your current build. Gear upgrades are awesome some are base and others have prefixes and suffixes. It reminds me of a mixture of diablo 1 and one of the final fantasy for Gameboy. I would definitely suggest this game!
The fact that you can't control how your companions act in combat or influence their level ups ruins an already underwhelming game.
replyContent: You are now able to control your companions both in and out of combat! You can choose their moves and attacks during battle, change their equipment, and select which abilities and spells they learn and improve as they level up. Thank you for your feedback!

content: Off the start, this game seemed interesting. However, I quickly realized how insanely repetitive the quests and combat are in this game. If you buy AlterKnight, you'll maybe enjoy it for two hours. Two hours of fun for $2.00 isnt a bad price, though.
replyContent: Thank you for your review! We apologize that you did not enjoy the game. We are continuing to improve AlterKnight with new features and additional content throughout the Beta. We recently released a large update that provides full control over NPC allies, makes combat more challenging, and speeds up the pace of the game. We hope you will enjoy it!

content: Having a blast exploring and leveling up my character. Really like the depth of the storyline and the small details like the little campfires! Can't wait to play more!
replyContent: Thank you for you review! Glad you are enjoying the game!

content: The movement speed of the characters is slow but its a pretty solid game so far
replyContent: We recently increased the movement speed of all players, allies, and enemies to speed up exploration. Leveling up your character's Agility will also increase how fast they move, and you can double-tap the screen to sprint for a further burst of speed! We hope you are enjoying the game, and thank you for your review!

content: This is a really fun mobile RPG! The mini crafting game is fun, I like running around looking for flowers. It's definitely challenging at times but there are a lot of different ways to build your character, so I recommend experimenting with skill tree combos!
replyContent: Thank you for your purchase and review! Let us know if you have any suggestions for new content or fun features! We would love to incorporate more community feedback into our upcoming updates. Cheers!
